casebody.data:
Worley, et al.
v.
Moore, et al. 310A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 15, 2016 Adam H. Charnes, Attorney at Law, John M. Moye, Attorney at Law, Atlanta, for Moore, Roy J., et al. R. Daniel Boyce, Attorney at Law, Thomas J. Ludlam, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Worley, Dennis, et al.

*804The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 8th of September 2016 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of September 2016." Ervin, J. recused

Defendants shall have up to and including the 26th day of October 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
